title: Bridging Cognitive Gap: Hierarchical Description Learning for Artistic Image Aesthetics Assessment
summary: The aesthetic quality assessment task is crucial for developing a human-aligned quantitative evaluation system for AIGC. However, its inherently complex nature, spanning visual perception, cognition, and emotion, poses fundamental challenges.
